attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That following the previous two times Peter Mandelson was sacked from a Goverment post due to his 'sleeze', he should not enter the House of Peers, as planned by the prime minister, but instead fight a by-election so that the General Public can judge accordingly whether he should again  become a goverment minister.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
